result.story: For some reason, drink history isn't as well documented as mathematic formulae or Canadian history. The origin of the Bloody Mary is disputed, but our story -- and we'll stick to it -- is that it was invented at The New York Bar in Paris in the early 20s. Might it be the winning color that has kept it in style, ever since?

result.story: The Bloody Mary is a classic cocktail with a disputed origin. For some reason, drink history isn't as well documented as mathematic formulae or Canadian history. But our story - and we'll stick to it - is that it was invented at The New York Bar in Paris in the early 20s. Might it be the winning color that has kept it in style, ever since?
